successes.title: IR-Blue - Thermal Imaging Smartphone Accessory
successes.description: The IR-Blue is an affordable thermal imaging accessory for iPhone and Android Devices. See the world in a new way.

Pledges.description:
PCB ONLY - A Printed Circuit Board for the IR-Blue. For this reward level you get a bare Printed Circuit Board for the Bluetooth 4 model or the the Bluetooth 2 model. Thanks! 
[Shipping within the US included]

EARLY BACKER - BUILD IT YOURSELF KIT - 
You get one of the first kits available. Everything you need to build an IR-Blue. All parts are through hole and easy to solder except the Bluetooth module which will already be soldered to the PCB. Thanks! ($160 estimated retail value) [Shipping within the US included]

BUILD IT YOURSELF KIT - Everything you need to build an IR-Blue. All parts are through hole except the Bluetooth module which will already be soldered to the PCB. Thanks! ($160 estimated retail value) [Shipping within the US included]

EARLY BACKER - IR-Blue fully assembled.
Fully assembled and tested IR-Blue. You are ready to start seeing the world in far infrared. Thanks! ($195 estimated retail value) [Shipping within the US included]

IR-BLUE FULLY ASSEMBLED -
Fully assembled and tested IR-Blue. You are ready to start seeing the world in far infrared. Thanks! ($195 estimated retail value) [Shipping within the US included]
